sourcesContent:
Expense Settlement Application
  • Home
  • Dashboard
  • Welcome {{email}}
  • Create New Group
  • Amount: {{amount}} |
  • Logout
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UserStoreService } from '../services/user-store.service'; import { UserServiceService } from '../services/user-service.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'], }) export class NavbarComponent implements OnInit { email!: any; amount!:any constructor( private userStoreService: UserStoreService, private useService: UserServiceService, private router:Router ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.userStoreService.getEmailFromStore().subscribe((data) => { this.email = data || this.useService.getEmailFromToken(); this.amount=this.useService.getAmountFromToken(); }); } onLogout(){ localStorage.clear(); this.router.navigateByUrl(""); } }
